name: Citizen's Madness
description:
Hi and welcome to 'Citizen's Madness', a city builder where your precious citizens is your currency!

Theme used (for the most part): The more, the less

Build your city to the limits, spending citizens to improve your city! Gain bonuses and more citizens by placing the best of the best buildings, make room for more citizens and listen to the beautiful birds singing your name in the background!

Controls:

Right Mouse button: Move the camera

Left Mouse Button: Select Plot

Escape: Exit Menu / Deselect Plot / Pause Game

H: Open help menu
